title: Can I control what parts of a Google account link up on my Pixel?
content: I have a lot of Google Accounts for different features. I don't need every account to show up in every app, though. For example, I have an account whose Drive I access a lot, but I don't want to see all of the emails for that account or have it show up in my Google Home. I also have a work Gmail account, and that shows up in my Google Home app, too. Can I have only certain apps see certain accounts, or is it all or nothing? Seems to be the latter...
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
